channel.title: CVE Feed for Very Good Plugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Very Good Plugins -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34660|2024-08-04T00:19:47.331Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: The WP Fusion Lite WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the startdate parameter found in the ~/includes/admin/logging/class-log-table-list.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 3.37.18.

item.title: CVE-2021-34661|2024-08-04T00:19:47.864Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: The WP Fusion Lite WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery via the `show_logs_section` function found in the ~/includes/admin/logging/class-log-handler.php file which allows attackers to drop all logs for the plugin, in versions up to and including 3.37.18.

item.title: CVE-2024-32796|2024-08-02T02:20:35.300Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Very Good Plugins WP Fusion Lite.This issue affects WP Fusion Lite: from n/a through 3.42.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-27972|2024-08-02T00:41:55.963Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in Very Good Plugins WP Fusion Lite allows Command Injection.This issue affects WP Fusion Lite: from n/a through 3.41.24.

item.title: CVE-2024-32455|2024-06-04T17:51:08.677Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- fatal%20error%20notify
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Very Good Plugins Fatal Error Notify.This issue affects Fatal Error Notify: from n/a through 1.5.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-32796|2024-06-04T17:50:06.763Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Very Good Plugins WP Fusion Lite.This issue affects WP Fusion Lite: from n/a through 3.42.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-27972|2024-04-03T11:51:43.101Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in Very Good Plugins WP Fusion Lite allows Command Injection.This issue affects WP Fusion Lite: from n/a through 3.41.24.

item.title: CVE-2024-27972|2024-06-19T14:27:03.299Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in Very Good Plugins WP Fusion Lite allows Command Injection.This issue affects WP Fusion Lite: from n/a through 3.41.24.

item.title: CVE-2024-32455|2024-08-02T02:13:39.028Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- fatal%20error%20notify
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Very Good Plugins Fatal Error Notify.This issue affects Fatal Error Notify: from n/a through 1.5.2.
